document.full_text: kevin durant matched his best playoff performance with 41 points, including the final nine for oklahoma city, and the thunder closed out their first-round series against the denver nuggets.
document.title: durant scores 41 and thunder eliminate nuggets
lines_and_colors: kevin durant matched his best playoff performance with 41 points, including the final nine for oklahoma city, and the thunder closed out their first-round series against the denver nuggets.
